creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text:
This is a problem with the format of the error messages.

Presenting such a stack trace for what amounts to a simple 404 error is not 
adequate for normal users.

Gregor has added an index.html file to cvs. I do not yet know if there are 
links on that page which might be broken (as long as the corresponding pages 
are not published).

In the end Lenya should somehow prevent publishing pages with invalid links. 
See Bug 19555 ("Implement link management").
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text: we have a not published yet screen now
creator: gregor@apache.org
